DataSourcePortable.Name: Processos duração
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT A.NOME PROCESSO, 
 SUM(@DIFDATAHORA(SEGUNDOS, A.INICIO, A.FIM)) DURACAO,
 SUM(CPU) TEMPO_CPU
FROM Z_PROCESSOS A
WHERE @CRITERIOSELECAO
GROUP BY A.NOME
ORDER BY SUM(CPU) DESC, DURACAO DESC" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="PROCESSO" From="A" Path="PROCESSO" /> <Field Alias="DURACAO" From="A" Path="DURACAO" /> <DecimalField Alias="TEMPO_CPU" From="A" Path="TEMPO_CPU" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
